snippet: State and federal regulators need to get a handle on the lack of disclosure in tactics used by companies that specialize in separating retirees from their pensions.
abstract: Editorial calls on state and federal regulators to get a handle on lack of disclosure in tactics used by 'pension advance' companies that specialize in separating retirees from their pensions.
lead_paragraph: State and federal regulators need to get a handle on the lack of disclosure in tactics used by companies that specialize in separating retirees from their pensions.
